TransactionGUID.description: GUID of any interaction a customer has with a restaurant.
GUID of any interaction a customer has with a restaurant.

TransactionDateTimeStamp.description: The date\/time that the transaction occurred.

BusinessDate.description: The business date when the transaction occurred.  This could be different than the timestamp depending on when the day is closed out.

TransactionDateTimeStamp.description: The date\/time that the transaction occurred.

BusinessDate.description: The business date when the transaction occurred.  This could be different than the timestamp depending on when the day is closed out.

DeviceID.description: An identifier for the physical device (cash terminal, punch clock, kiosk, etc.).

DeviceDescription.description: A name or description for the device.

DeviceID.description: An identifier for the physical device (cash terminal, punch clock, kiosk, etc.).

DeviceDescription.description: A name or description for the device.

PartyName.description: Name used to identify one or more individuals.

TotalInParty.description: The total number of individuals in the party.

Quantity.description: The number requested of the item identified in the SeatingType field.

PartyTypeQuantity.description: Specifies the quantity of people in the party for the specified PartyType.

Timestamp.description: The date\/time that the state was entered.

ReservationDateTime.description: The date and time for the reservation.
The date and time for the reservation.

TimeCardCorrelationGUID.description: A unique identifier for the time card transaction.  If this transaction is an adjustment of a punch card transction, the TimeCardCorrelationGUID will be the same as the original time card record.
A unique identifier for the time card transaction.  If this transaction is an adjustment of a punch card transction, the TimeCardCorrelationGUID will be the same as the original time card record.

ClockDateTime.description: The date and time of the punch.

CreatedTimestamp.description: Specifies the date and time that a manual punch was entered.

Reason.description: Allows text details regarding the punch to be sent.

systemGeneratedInd.description: When true, the system generated the punch transaction.

ClockDateTime.description: The date and time of the punch.

CreatedTimestamp.description: Specifies the date and time that a manual punch was entered.

Reason.description: Allows text details regarding the punch to be sent.

systemGeneratedInd.description: When true, the system generated the punch transaction.

JobCode.description: A code that represents a position that this employee works in.

JobCodeName.description: A description for the job code.

Rate.description: The pay rate for this position.

RefundTotal.description: The total amount of the reimbursement.

RefundReason.description: Specifies why the refund was made.

RefundReasonDescription.description: Provides a more detailed explanation for the refund.

DrawerEventGUID.description: A unique identifier for a drawer event used to tie multiple drawer transactions to a single drawer event.
A unique identifier for a drawer event used to tie multiple drawer transactions to a single drawer event.

TillID.description: An identifier for the removeable cash holder that can be placed in or removed from the drawer.

DrawerOpenTime.description: The date\/time the drawer was open (represented in ISO 8601 format).

DrawerCloseTime.description: The date\/time the drawer was closed (represented in ISO 8601 format).

ReasonDescription.description: Textual information to further describe the reason for the drawer event.

examples.value: Drawer opened to assign till at beginning of shift.

ReferencedTransactionGUID.description: A unique identifier a transaction that initiated the drawer event (e.g. Order, Reservation).

TillID.description: An identifier for the removeable cash holder that can be placed in or removed from the drawer.

DrawerOpenTime.description: The date\/time the drawer was open (represented in ISO 8601 format).

DrawerCloseTime.description: The date\/time the drawer was closed (represented in ISO 8601 format).

ReasonDescription.description: Textual information to further describe the reason for the drawer event.

examples.value: Drawer opened to assign till at beginning of shift.

ReferencedTransactionGUID.description: A unique identifier a transaction that initiated the drawer event (e.g. Order, Reservation).

Amount.description: The total amount related to the drawer transaction.  If broken out into denominations then the total of the amounts for all of the denomination objects would be expressed in this field.

MonetaryDeviceID.description: An identifier for an external device (e.g. coin dispenser, reverse ATM).

MonetaryDeviceDescription.description: A description of the external monetary device.

Amount.description: The monetary amount of this denomination (e.g type = $10 Amount=$80 Quantity = 8, means there are 8 ten dollar bills that have the value of $80.00).
